'''1.7.10 Build 14<ref name="blog22">{{link|url=https://mcedudev.tumblr.com/post/111266220969/wiki-redesign-new-development-build|title=Wiki Redesign & new Development build |date=February 17, 2015|website=Tumblr|author=}}</ref>''' is the fourteenth build for {{El|MinecraftEdu}} 1.7.10, released on February 17, 2015. It is based on [[Java Edition 1.7.10]].

== Additions ==
* Individual usercommands like <code>togglefreeze</code> and <code>togglemute</code> now accept <code>true</code> or <code>false</code> as a parameter.
* More mods to the online mods repository.

== Changes ==
* Signs are now saved with UTF-8 encoding.

== Fixes ==
* Students being able to get edu blocks from the creative intentory if mods were installed.
* Translations not defaulting to English if current language was not supported in edu.
